title: Closet space
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Youth - Sexual behavior
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Gay and lesbian studies
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Sexual behavior
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Coming out (Sexual orientation)
description: Parents with gay children share their experiences and feelings, fears and joys on discovering that their child is gay. A parents supporting parents Flag (South Australia), which aims to bring families together and break down the barriers of homophobia. An honest and open discussion piece which challenges and debates notions of heterosexism as parents and children share their personal stories.
